name: book-search-engine
description: A book search engine demonstrating M.E.R.N. stack development by using using Google Books API and GraphQL with Apollo Server to fetch and modify data, replacing the old RESTful API method.

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.update: cd client && ncu -u && npm i && cd .. && cd server && ncu -u && npm i &&ncu -u && npm i

author: Ceres Cook
